edu.cnm.deepdive.eb.flashme.fragments

Class AddCardFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.eb.flashme.fragments.AddCardFragment

  • public class AddCardFragment
extends java.lang.Object
    A fragment that handles the creation of cards, and facilitate smooth transition onto the ImageActivity to allow users to add Images onto the database. It is within this fragment that the Card entity is used to create, and populate the database with card values that will later be used by multiple components (fragments and activities) to do their respective functions.
